# Getting Support

Thank you for your interest in the Coordination Trilemma project! Here's how to get help depending on what you need.

## Quick Links

- üìñ [Documentation](../docs/README.md) - Complete documentation index
- üêõ [Report a Bug](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml) - Found a problem?
- ‚ú® [Request a Feature](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/issues/new?template=feature_request.yml) - Have an idea?
- ‚ùì [Ask a Question](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/issues/new?template=question.yml) - Need help?
- üí¨ [Discussions](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/discussions) - General discussion

## What Kind of Help Do You Need?

### üìÑ Understanding the Paper's Content

**For questions about the academic arguments:**
- Read the [published PDF](https://enlightenment.dev/main.pdf)
- Check the [main README](../README.md) for a summary of key arguments
- Open a [Question](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/issues/new?template=question.yml) issue for clarification
- Use [Discussions](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/discussions) for broader philosophical dialogue

**For academic content issues (errors, inconsistencies, missing citations):**
- Use the [Paper Content Issue](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/issues/new?template=paper_content.yml) template
- See [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) for guidelines on content contributions

### üîß Building the PDF

**First-time builders:**
1. Start with the [Quick Start Guide](../docs/quickstart.md)
2. See [BUILD.md](../docs/BUILD.md) for complete build instructions
3. Check [TROUBLESHOOTING.md](../docs/TROUBLESHOOTING.md) if you encounter issues

**Common build issues:**
- Docker not found ‚Üí [Docker Setup Guide](../docs/docker-setup.md)
- LaTeX errors ‚Üí [LaTeX Guide](../docs/latex-guide.md)
- Permission errors ‚Üí [TROUBLESHOOTING.md](../docs/TROUBLESHOOTING.md)

**Still stuck?**
- Search [existing issues](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/issues?q=is%3Aissue)
- Open a [Bug Report](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml) with details

### üîê Security & Verification

**Verifying signatures:**
- See [SECURITY.md](../SECURITY.md) for complete verification instructions
- Run `./scripts/verify-signatures.sh` for automated verification
- Check [SLSA Roadmap](../docs/SLSA_ROADMAP.md) for security details

**Reporting security vulnerabilities:**
- **DO NOT** open a public issue
- Use [GitHub Security Advisories](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/security/advisories/new)
- See [SECURITY.md](../SECURITY.md) for security policy

### üìö Documentation Issues

**Found unclear, incorrect, or missing documentation?**
- Use the [Documentation Issue](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/issues/new?template=documentation.yml) template
- Specify which document and what's wrong
- Suggest improvements if possible

### üõ†Ô∏è Contributing

**Want to contribute?**
- Read [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) for complete guidelines
- Check [open issues](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/issues) for ideas
- Look for issues labeled `good first issue` or `help wanted`

**Types of contributions we welcome:**
- Corrections to proofs or arguments
- Additional evidence or counterexamples
- Documentation improvements
- Build system enhancements
- Security improvements

### üí¨ General Discussion

**For broader topics:**
- Use [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/discussions) for:
  - Philosophical dialogue about the paper's claims
  - Implementation ideas for voluntary coordination
  - Research collaboration
  - Teaching/educational use
  - General feedback

## Response Time

This is an academic project maintained by volunteers:
- **Security issues**: Responded to within 48 hours
- **Bug reports**: Typically reviewed within 1 week
- **Feature requests**: Reviewed based on priority and scope
- **Questions**: Community-supported, response time varies
- **Discussions**: Async, no guaranteed response time

## Before Asking for Help

To help us help you faster:

1. ‚úÖ **Search existing resources:**
   - Check [documentation](../docs/README.md)
   - Search [closed issues](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aclosed)
   - Review [Discussions](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/discussions)

2. ‚úÖ **Provide details:**
   - What you tried
   - What you expected
   - What actually happened
   - Your environment (OS, Docker version, etc.)
   - Relevant error messages or logs

3. ‚úÖ **Be specific:**
   - Bad: "Build doesn't work"
   - Good: "Running `make` gives error 'docker: command not found' on Ubuntu 22.04"

## Code of Conduct

All interactions must follow our [Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). We're committed to providing a welcoming and inclusive environment for academic discourse and technical collaboration.

---

**Can't find what you need?** Open a [Question](https://github.com/realnedsanders/Coordination-Trilemma/issues/new?template=question.yml) and we'll help direct you!
